name: df-slt
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cslt, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), csur), wcel(cv(s1), csur)), wrex(s2, con0, wa(wral(s3, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3)))), wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), ctp(cop(c1o, emptycls), cop(c1o, c2o), cop(emptycls, c2o)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))))
comment: Next, we introduce surreal less-than, a comparison relationship over the surreals by lexicographically ordering them. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 9-Jun-2011.)
